    • Method Detail

      • getCurrencyMappingForAddress

        public static Currency getCurrencyMappingForAddress(Address address)
        Given a Address, return the corresponding Currency This method will attempt to find the appropriate currency for the given Address. It will search based on the Country, then State of the supplied Address to find a matching Currency.
        Parameters:
        address - The address for which we need the Currency
        Returns:
        the currency for the supplied address; null if the passed-in address is null

      • getCurrencyMappingForCountry

        public static Currency getCurrencyMappingForCountry(Country country)
        Given a Country, return the corresponding Currency
        Parameters:
        country - The country for which we need the Currency
        Returns:
        the currency for the supplied country typecode; null if the passed-in country is null

      • getCurrencyMappingForJurisdiction

        public static Currency getCurrencyMappingForJurisdiction(Jurisdiction jurisdiction)
        Given a Jurisdiction, return the corresponding Currency First, it will attempt to find the Country for the Jurisdiction and the Currency for the Country. If there is no valid Currency that way, it will query the Jurisdiction directly. This behavior helps to mitigate situations like Guam and the Virgin Islands. Guam, for example, is a territory which cannot claim the US as it's country. However, as it's own Jurisdiction, it can be configured to have a Currency (USD).
        Parameters:
        jurisdiction - The country for which we need the Currency
        Returns:
        the currency for the supplied jurisdiction typecode; null if the passed-in jurisdiction is null
